name: Cefore
description:
CEFORE is a physics-based puzzler in an abstract simplistic art style in which you get contracted to bring down different structures in the most creative ways possible. Try not to cause too much destruction, of course.

In Cefore you control Baro, an intergalactic contractor in charge of gathering the data on different planets. To do so, Baro uses different tools (such as explosive charges, grapples, hot air balloons several others...) to destroy the environment and gather what he needs.




  • Visit different planets with your shipCustomize your ship and visit different planets to collect the data Baro needs.

  • 100% destructible environmentEverything in the environment is affected by the physics.

  • More than 15 different tools to destroy and manipulate the environmentUse the tools you want the way you want and get creative destroying the structures

  • Character customizationUnlock different skins and hats for the character (Baro)

  • Twitch integration
